articles.description: The Chelsea boss said Ziyech, Chilwell and James were all doubts for the London derby against Arsenal. He also admitted the Blues have missed Ziyech's creativity in midfield since his injury.
articles.content:
Frank Lampard has confirmed Chelsea could be without the trio of Hakim Ziyech, Ben Chilwell and Reece James for their Boxing Day clash against Arsenal.
